I am pretty sure that any school in Australia can enter the competition

hey guys just to update you all flaktest is a national tournament available to all school teams
you just need a teacher from your school to be on board with the whole tournament and you may need to pay registration fee all up it's a great experience although some things need to change :) . The head of flaktest encourages more schools to come join the tournament it is expected to be a much bigger tournament next year so register your team and get on the rift. Flaktest also hold other comps for cs, rocket league and what not so if you have a couple of friends at the same school who share your passion in gaming just head over to https://www.flaktest.com

Hey, i was wondering if there was some way i could be alerted with these tournaments. I really want to join one of these high school tournaments, but whenever i see it in the league client, it's always when it's finished or after registrations.
To get updates on High School related League news, go to http://www.leaguehighschool.com and subscribe to the newsletter :) (scroll to the bottom).
